About me

Hello, my name is Kareem Gbolahan, I'm an Runner with almost 2 years of experience. They say the journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. For me, that first step wasn't just the start of a run, it was the beginning of a lifelong obsession. As a professional runner specializing in marathons, middle-distance track events, etc, I'm constantly pushing my limits, driven by the thrill of competition and the relentless pursuit of personal bests.

My journey began in 2023 when I ventured into the world of athletics. Since then, I've honed my skills through years of dedicated training, fueled by an unwavering work ethic and a hunger for continuous improvement. My commitment extends beyond the physical aspects, I believe in the power of mental focus and strategic planning to achieve peak performance.

My sights are set on qualifying for interstate race competitions, and also in the long run, Olympic competitions. I'm actively seeking opportunities to mentorships, sponsorships, coaching partnerships. I'm confident that my dedication, talent, and passion for the sport can be a valuable asset to any team or brand.

Ready to take the next step with a driven and accomplished runner? Let's connect!

Strengths

Resilience

Overcame challenges and setbacks with unwavering determination, maintaining focus on continuous improvement.

Thrived in dynamic and ever changing competitive environments, quickly adjusting strategies amd techniques to excel against diverse opponents.
